wsj.title: Mayweather vs. Pacquiao: It’s Actually On
wsj.topComment: On the undercard: Leon Spinks v. George Foreman, Roberto Duran v. Sugar Ray Leonard, and an old movie of the Rocky Marciano-Joe Louis bout.

wsj.title: Vive le Snotty French Waiter
wsj.topComment: In my years visiting Paris on business, I have never encountered the truly arrogant waiter---they are human and accessible---but plenty of arrogant Americans.

wsj.title: Can an App Be Too Successful? Ask ‘Trivia Crack’
wsj.topComment:
Gosh, I didn't know Trivia Crack was causing the demise of civilization as we know it. ;)

For us, it's one of the few apps that actually tend to bring the family together, including the 3 year old. (Really! She loves pushing the buttons.) Plus, unli...
